H0.text: The Melrose Cup is awarded in which ball sport. Rugby

H1.text: The Melrose Cup is awarded in which ball sport. Cricket

H2.text: The Melrose Cup is awarded in which ball sport. Football

H3.text: The Melrose Cup is awarded in which ball sport. VIIs

A4.text: The Melrose Cup is the main prize of the Rugby World Cup Sevens.

A5.text: The trophy has been presented to the winner of the world cup since the inaugural tournament in 1993.
